Class ARF2Layout

java.lang.Object
  edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.AbstractLayout
      ch.ethz.sg.cuttlefish.layout.ARF2Layout
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.uci.ics.jung.utils.ChangeEventSupport, edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.Layout, edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.LayoutMutable, edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.VertexLocationFunction
public class ARF2Layout
extends edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.AbstractLayout
implements edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.Layout, edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.LayoutMutable

Author:
markus michael geipel An implementation of the ARF Layouter. See http://www.sg.ethz.ch/research/ for details

Field Detail

updatesPerFrame

private int updatesPerFrame
number of position updates before the graph is rendered

a

private double a
the parameter a controls the attraction between connected nodes.

attraction

private double attraction
??? is a scaling factor for the attractive term. Connected as well as unconnected nodes are affected.

b

private double b
b scales the repulsive force

deltaT

private double deltaT
deltaT controls the calculation precision: smaller deltaT results in higher precission

FIXED

public static final java.lang.String FIXED
A marker used to tag nodes that shall not be moved
